original: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: ▁ava ssu tāya ▁bhikkhuniyā ▁a vass ut assa ▁puris apuggal assa ▁kāya saṃ sagg aṃ ▁sādiy anti yā ▁āpattiyo ▁catunnaṃ ▁adhikaraṇ ānaṃ ▁katamaṃ ▁adhikaraṇ aṃ

original: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ—āpattādhikaraṇaṁ …pe….
analyzed: ▁ava ssu tāya ▁bhikkhuniyā ▁a vass ut assa ▁puris apuggal assa ▁kāya saṃ sagg aṃ ▁sādiy anti yā ▁āpattiyo ▁catunnaṃ ▁adhikaraṇ ānaṃ ā patt ādhikaraṇ aṃ ▁pe

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: ▁dad hi ṃ ▁viññāp etvā ▁bhuñjant iyā ▁āpattiyo ▁catunnaṃ ▁adhikaraṇ ānaṃ ▁katamaṃ ▁adhikaraṇ aṃ

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ—āpattādhikaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: ▁dad hi ṃ ▁viññāp etvā ▁bhuñjant iyā ▁āpattiyo ▁catunnaṃ ▁adhikaraṇ ānaṃ ā patt ādhikaraṇ aṃ
